text:
[Verse]
City lights shining bright
Neon dreams light the night
Streets alive hearts in flight
Everything feels so right

[Verse 2]
People laugh music loud
Lost inside the glowing crowd
Dancing through the city's shroud
Silver moon behind a cloud

[Chorus]
City lights give me life
Burning bright cutting strife
In the night no more fight
Only love only light

[Verse 3]
Traffic hums stories told
Every corner new and bold
Wanderlust can’t be controlled
City love never gets old

[Verse 4]
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Heartbeats rise we feel high
Under stars we never cry
With the lights we won't say bye

[Bridge]
Flashing dreams electrify
Urban jungle do or die
Feel the pulse as we fly
City's heart hear its sigh
title: City Lights
